node.title: My favourite poll on PerlMonks is ...
node.author: Ratazong

data.field: [id://1452] - the first one ever [id://119433] - the poll with the highest participation [id://5995] - the poll with the fewest votes cast [id://158740] - one of the polls with the fewest options [id://160999] - the first one on Perl6 [id://482550] - one of the many polls about polls this poll ;-) yet to come none - I hate polls. Bah. some other
